channel.title: CVE Feed for flippercode -- WP Security Question
channel.description: The latest CVEs for flippercode -- WP Security Question

item.title: CVE-2021-4386|2024-08-03T17:23:10.751Z -- flippercode -- wp%20security%20question
item.description: The WP Security Question plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.0.5. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the save() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to modify the plugin's settings via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
